extra: You asked, we delivered: Folders have arrived in Zen! Organise your browsing the way you want. Create a folder from the sidebar with the plus (+) button, give it a name, then drag and drop tabs inside. Right–click a folder to rename or delete it, and rearrange them anytime to keep projects or saved links in order. Folders have been one of the most requested features since Zen’s launch, and they’re finally here.
fixes: Resolved compact mode twitching issue when hovering the URL bar.
Fixed pinned tab titles not showing on the urlbar search results
Fix performance issue with pinned tabs pre-loading at startup
features: Implemented monochromatic icons for spaces, folders, etc.
Added a small animation when updating Zen
changes: Third party domains now open in their own tabs when opened on pinned and essential tabs
Added a more native feel to windows users
New profiles or resetting to default shortcuts will now have next/previous workspace assigned as ctrl+alt+LEFT/RIGHT, toggle compact mode as ctrl+S and save page as ctrl+alt+S
Compact mode with no browser padding will now have a separation between the sidebar and the window edge
